Text: This is an awesome movie. I saw it on TCM fri. night scare fest or whatever that was called. Lon Chaney JR.'s performance is incredible. You'll get a lump in your throat watching him, particularly at the end. Such real pain and sincerity etched on his face. Good up my friend.
Thanks for this 'classic'. I had it on vhs but this is better. Jill Banner is so captivating in this.
